doc:
Byron Barr https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Byron_Barr 0 Byron Barr (August 18, 1917 – November 3, 1966), sometimes billed as Byron S. Barr, was an American actor. He appeared in 19 films between 1944 and 1951. Barr is perhaps best known for his role as Nino Zachetti in Double Indemnity, his first appearance. He also had a role in films like Love Letters, Pitfall, Down Dakota Way, They Made Me a Killer, and The File on Thelma Jordon. His only lead role came in the 1946 B-movie Tokyo Rose. Barr retired from acting in 1951. He died on November 3, 1966, in Sacramento County, California, of unknown causes at age 49. Byron_Barr ( August_18_,_1917 – November_3_,_1966 ) , sometimes billed as Byron_S._Barr , was an_American_actor . He appeared in 19_films between 1944_and_1951 . Barr is_perhaps_best_known for his_role as Nino_Zachetti in Double_Indemnity , his_first_appearance . He also had a_role in films like Love_Letters , Pitfall , Down_Dakota_Way , They Made Me a_Killer , and The_File on Thelma_Jordon . His_only_lead_role came in the_1946_B-movie_Tokyo_Rose . Barr retired from acting in 1951 . He died on November_3_,_1966 , in Sacramento_County , California , of unknown_causes at age_49 .
